tossup_question: -   –  What is one possible evolutionary adaptation that animals may have acquired to sense seismic activity?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Vibration triggered early warning responses
X)Heightened sensitivity to light
Y)Heightened sensitivity to temperature changes along the fault plane
Z)Air pressure sensitivity
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) VIBRATION TRIGGERED EARLY WARNING RESPONSES
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is closest to the average number of years between reversals of the polarity of Earth's magnetic field?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)200,000
X)2 million
Y)20 million
Z)200 million
